creditline: Gift of Mrs. John P. Rutherfurd in Memory of her father, Mr. Thomas Shevlin
description: deep faience plate of fluted hexagonal shape; rim edged with green-brown glaze; center of plate contains chinoserie motif of a standing flower with a walking stick; flowers of Indianische Blumen type encircle plate edge; on reverse, two sets of stilt marks visible; colors are blue, yellow and green
title: Plate
